cause.description:
The Bubel Aiken Foundation was founded my recording artist Clay Aiken to serve to bridge the gap that exists between young people with special needs and the world around them. Its’ mission is to support communities and programs in creating awareness and opportunities for full inclusion where barriers break and doors open and achieves to create an environment for children where inclusion is embraced.
1. Children with disabilities should be included in their comunity.
2. Children with and without diabilities should learn and play together
cause.mission: Creating communities where ALL children can learn, live, and play together.
cause.name: Bubel Aiken Foundation
